description: Try our easy to follow Croquette & Avocado Dip recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Arancini & croquette,Pescatarian,Low salt,Tree nut free,Low sugar,Potato,Fish,High protein,Christmas,Avocado,Peanut free
name: Croquette & Avocado Dip Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 50ml olive oil Spanish mellow, for shallow frying

recipeInstructions.text: Place potatoes in a saucepan and cover with cold water. Bring to the boil. Reduce heat to medium-low. Simmer for 15 to 20 minutes or until tender. Drain and return to saucepan. Mash. Add milk and beat until smooth. Transfer to a bowl.
Melt butter in a small frying pan over a medium heat. Add onion and cook for 3-4 minutes or until soft. Add garlic and paprika. Cook for 1 minute. Add to bowl with potato. Stir in tuna and chives.

Whisk eggs in a small bowl. Place breadcrumbs onto a flat plate. Shape 1/4 cup of the mixture into sausages. Dip each into egg then coat well with breadcrumbs. Shallow fry croquettes in oil over medium heat for about 5 minutes, turning occasionally, until golden.
Halve avocado and discard stone. Scoop flesh into a food processor. Add sour cream, lime juice, cumin and hot sauce. Process until smooth. Serve with croquettes.
